card.name: A Beloved World

card.text: Spells you control can’t be countered this turn. Pursue Wonder. (Reveal a basic land or Wonder card you own from your sanctum and put it into your hand.)

card.text: When Chitterbit enters, you may reveal a basic land card you your sanctum. If a Plains or Mountain card was revealed, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. If an Island or Swamp card was revealed, surveil 2. If a Forest card was revealed, you gain 3 life.

card.name: Heat of Potential

card.name: Holt Sleeper
card.text: Holt Sleeper enters tapped with three stun counters on it if it was cast from your hand. (If a permanent with a stun counter would become untapped, remove one from it instead.) Whenever you cast a blue, black, red, or green spell, untap Holt Sleeper and you gain 2 life. This ability triggers only once each turn.

card.name: Insight Beyond the Clouds
card.text: Augmented — Surveil 1, then draw a card. If you’ve spent WUBRG to cast spells this turn, instead draw two cards.

card.name: Lost in the Horizon
card.text: Choose one — • Exile target creature token. • Exile up to two target cards from among graveyards. • Exile target enchantment with mana value 3 or less.

card.name: Mesmerize
card.text: Exile target nonland permanent you control, then you may return it to the battlefield under its owner’s control. If you don’t, return it to its owner’s hand, then draw a card.

[+1]: Put your choice of a +1/+1 counter or a menace counter on up to one target creature. [-2]: Exile target nonland permanent. Its owner may cast it without paying its mana cost on a later turn as long as it remains exiled. [-5]: Draw three cards, then discard a card.

card.name: Power's Promise
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature or exile three creature cards from your graveyard. Draw a card, then pursue Wonder. (Reveal a basic land or Wonder card you own from your sanctum and put it into your hand.)

It gains haste.

card.name: Retreat to the Borderholt

card.text: Emerge 5R (You may cast this spell by sacrificing a creature and paying the emerge cost reduced by that creature’s mana value.) Wish for Destruction deals 6 damage to target creature and 2 damage to up to one target player, planeswalker, or creature token.

card.name: Wish for Relief
card.text: Emerge 5B (You may cast this spell by sacrificing a creature and paying the emerge cost reduced by that creature’s mana value.) Choose one — • Exile target creature. • You draw two cards, each opponent loses 2 life, and you gain 2 life.

card.name: Wish for Revenge
card.text: Emerge 5R (You may cast this spell by sacrificing a creature and paying the emerge cost reduced by that creature’s mana value.) When Wish for Revenge enters, it deals 1 damage to up to one target creature. If it emerged, it instead deals damage equal to the sacrificed creature’s power to that creature.

card.name: Wish for Wealth
card.text: Emerge 5G (You may cast this spell by sacrificing a creature and paying the emerge cost reduced by that creature’s mana value.) {T}: Add WUBRG. This mana can’t be spent to pay generic mana costs.

card.name: Ajha, the Wish for Home
card.text: Emerge 5BG (You may cast this spell by sacrificing a creature and paying the emerge cost reduced by that creature’s mana value.) Flying, lifelink, vigilance When Ajha enters, return any number of target creature cards with total mana value 5 or less that weren’t put there this turn from your graveyard to the battlefield under your control.

card.name: Citadel Amnoctix
card.text: Ward—Sacrifice two creatures. Ploy — Each opponent sacrifices two creatures. (When this creature attacks, you may trigger its ploy. If you do, sacrifice it at the next end step.)

card.name: Fascinated Immortal
card.text: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each color among monocolored cards in your graveyard. 1GU, Discard Fascinated Immortal: Look at the top five cards of your library. You may put a land card from among them onto the battlefield tapped or a card from among them into your hand. Put the rest into your graveyard.

card.name: Gilded Ancient
card.text: Vigilance When Gilded Ancient enters, target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of creatures you control. Reflect 2W (2W: Create a token copy of this creature, except it’s a 1/1 Wonder Cat without reflect. Reflect only as a sorcery, and only once.)

card.name: Ilcan Szcygite
card.text: Lifelink When Ilcan Szcygite enters and at the beginning of your upkeep, put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature you control. It gains indestructible until end of turn. 2W: Put Ilcan Szcygite from your hand onto the battlefield tapped with five stun counters on it.

card.name: New Tensuo Calmkeeper
card.text: Vigilance, lifelink When New Tensuo Calmkeeper enters, create a 3/3 green Beast creature token and a 1/1 Wonder creature token that’s all colors.

card.name: Polymorphic Wispweaver
card.text: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature you attacked with this turn. 2W, Discard Polymorphic Wispweaver: Create two 1/1 Wonder creature tokens that are all colors.

card.name: Skyview Chronomancer
card.text: Flying Ward—Skip your next draw step. Ploy—If it isn’t an extra turn, take an extra turn after this one. (When this creature attacks, you may trigger its ploy. If you do, sacrifice it at the next end step.)

card.name: Starsea Bloomqueen
card.text: Flying 1R, Discard Starsea Bloomqueen: Starsea Bloomqueen deals 2 damage to any target. 6B: You may exile six target cards from among graveyards. If you do, return Starsea Bloomqueen from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.

card.name: Wish for Authority
card.text: Emerge 6U (You may cast this spell by sacrificing a creature and paying the emerge cost reduced by that creature’s mana value.) When Wish for Authority enters, tap up to one target creature and put a stun counter on it. (If a permanent with a stun counter would become untapped, remove one from it instead.)

card.name: Wish for Eternity
card.text: Emerge 6G (You may cast this spell by sacrificing a creature and paying the emerge cost reduced by that creature’s mana value.) When Wish for Eternity enters, you gain 7 life.

card.name: Wish for Strength
card.text: Emerge 7G (You may cast this spell by sacrificing a creature and paying the emerge cost reduced by that creature’s mana value.) Trample If Wish for Strength emerged from a creature with power 4 or greater, it can’t be countered and enters with a hexproof counter.

card.name: Wish for Transformation
card.text: Emerge 6G (You may cast this spell by sacrificing a creature and paying the emerge cost reduced by that creature’s mana value.) When Wish for Transformation enters, search your library for a non-Spirit creature card, reveal it, then put it into your hand. If it emerged from a creature with greater power than that card’s mana value, put it onto the battlefield instead.

card.name: Paradel Prism
card.text: Flying When Paradel Prism enters, target opponent sacrifices a monocolored permanent, then sacrifices a multicolored permanent. For each time they couldn’t, you draw a card.

card.name: Planar Resurrection
card.text: Return target white permanent card, target blue permanent card, target black permanent card, target red permanent card, target green permanent card, and target colorless permanent card from your graveyard to the battlefield. (You can’t cast this spell unless you have legal choices for all its targets.)

card.name: Wish for Power
card.text: Emerge 8B (You may cast this spell by sacrificing a creature and paying the emerge cost reduced by that creature’s mana value.) Ward—Sacrifice a nontoken creature.

card.name: Sailing the Starsea
card.text: Augmented — Exile Sailing the Starsea: Copy target instant or sorcery spell you control. If you’ve spent WUBRG to cast spells this turn, you may instead copy target spell you control twice. You may choose new targets for the copies.

card.name: Starsea Leviathan
card.text: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each instant and sorcery card in your graveyard. When Starsea Leviathan enters, you may pursue Wonder. If you don’t, draw a card. (To pursue Wonder, reveal a basic land or Wonder card you own from your sancum and put it into your hand.)

card.name: Stymied Purpose
card.text: Each player can’t draw more than one card each turn. 1B, Sacrifice a creature: Each opponent discards a card. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Starshine Wisp
card.text: {T}: Add one mana of any color. This mana can’t be spent to cast a spell with mana value 4 or less.
